title: jaya jaya padmanAbha murArE
sahitya:
jaya jaya padmanAbha murArE jaya jagadIsha ramAkAnta


anupallavi

  nayana vinindita naLina ruciradaLa natajana shubhakara nArada sEvita


caraNam 1    nigamAgama vEdya nIraja sama caraNa bhOgi bhOga shayana bhAsura jaladAbha 
vAgIshAdi surajAla viracita nija sEvAvigata rOSa murArE viracaya shubhamayi
    caraNam 2    parama hamsa nivaha pariNuta janArdana suradana kAntijita cAru kunda mukuLa 
parAshara muniprOkta bhAgatAdi cAru carita shravaNarata shubha vitaraNa
    caraNam 3    parama bhakta divAkara kAma pUraNa parilasa mama hrdi pUrNa candrAnana 
vara vanci mArtANDa varma krta lakSadIpa bhUri manOjnyamaha pramudita krpavAsa
